scripts.build-debug: npm run cargo-build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('debug'))fs.mkdirSync('debug')" && node -e "fs.copyFileSync('../../../target/debug/windows_utils.dll', 'debug/index.node')"
scripts.build-arm: npm run cargo-build -- --release --target aarch64-pc-windows-msvc && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist'))fs.mkdirSync('dist'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist/win32-arm64-msvc'))fs.mkdirSync('dist/win32-arm64-msvc')" && node -e "fs.copyFileSync('../../../target/aarch64-pc-windows-msvc/release/windows_utils.dll', 'dist/win32-arm64-msvc/index.node')"
scripts.build-x86: npm run cargo-build -- --release --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist'))fs.mkdirSync('dist'); if(!fs.existsSync('dist/win32-x64-msvc'))fs.mkdirSync('dist/win32-x64-msvc')" && node -e "fs.copyFileSync('../../../target/x86_64-pc-windows-msvc/release/windows_utils.dll', 'dist/win32-x64-msvc/index.node')"
